Michael wrote:

> 
> 
> Mr Bryant,
> No disrespect. your site is very well infomative. I guess I worded 
> it wrong, I was looking for something a little more illustrated in 
> the making process. Unfortunatly I am not able to read well. I have 
> a strong dyslexia that makes your instructions text look like 
> Einsteins theory of relitivity. I have made 3 sets of armor from 
> barrel plastic just from your patterns as well as others just by 
> looking at the pictures. I would just like to make a more genuine 
> looking armor now. 

Ah, I get you -- more an "illustrated step by step" thing. Fraid not -- the 
thing would be HUGE. Plus, for the record, there's nothing REMOTELY like the 
manual even in Japanese. Some folks are less than pleased that I did what I did 
(being secrets of the craft and all).

Tony
